Name: profit-report
Label: Profit Report

Components.Label: Group
Components.Query:
[
    {
        "Id": "ds.ParentId",
        "Name": "File No",
        "GroupBy": "ParentId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Parent.Code",
        "OrderBy": "ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.CustomerId",
        "Name": "Customer",
        "GroupBy": "CustomerId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Customer.Name",
        "OrderBy": "ds.CustomerId asc,ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.SaleId",
        "Name": "Sale",
        "GroupBy": "SaleId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Sale.FullName",
        "OrderBy": "ds.SaleId asc,ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.ShipmentTypeId",
        "Name": "Shipment Type",
        "GroupBy": "ShipmentTypeId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.ShipmentType.Name",
        "OrderBy": "ds.ShipmentTypeId asc,ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc"
    },
    {
        "Id": "ds.TypeId",
        "Name": "Service Mode",
        "GroupBy": "TypeId",
        "GroupFormat": "this.Entity.Type.Name",
        "OrderBy": "ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc"
    }
]

Components.Label: Department
Sales man
Partner
Shipper
Consignee
Service mode
File No
HBL No
ShipmentFee
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "SELECT ds.*,sm.VendorId as VendorId,sm.AgentId as AgentId,sm.MblNo as MblNo,
    ds.ActualRevenue{Currency} as ActualRevenue,
    ds.ActualCost{Currency} as ActualCost,
    ds.ActualCom{Currency} as ActualCom,
    ds.ActualProfit{Currency} as ActualProfit
    FROM [Shipment] ds 
    join [Shipment] sm on sm.Id = ds.ParentId 
    where (ds.ParentId is not null
    AND ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' AND ds.{DateFieldId} < '{ToDate}'
    AND sm.IsComplete IN ({Complete})
    AND ('{VendorIds}' = ''
    OR sm.VendorId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR sm.AgentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR ds.CustomerId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ShipperIds}' = '' OR ds.ShipperId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ShipperIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ConsigneeIds}' = '' OR ds.ConsigneeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ConsigneeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{SaleIds}' = '' OR ds.SaleId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{SaleIds}', ',')))
    AND (('{FileIds}' = '' or ds.ParentId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FileIds}', ','))))
    AND ('{DepartmentId}' = '' or ds.DepartmentId = '{DepartmentId}')
    AND (('{HblIds}' = '' or ds.Id in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ','))))
    AND ('{TypeIds}' = '' OR ds.TypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{TypeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ShipmentTypeId}' = '' OR ds.ShipmentTypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ShipmentTypeId}', ',')))
    )",
    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total 
    FROM [Shipment] ds 
    join [Shipment] sm on sm.Id = ds.ParentId 
    where (ds.ParentId is not null
    AND ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' AND ds.{DateFieldId} < '{ToDate}'
    AND sm.IsComplete IN ({Complete})
    AND ('{VendorIds}' = ''
    OR sm.VendorId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR sm.AgentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))
    OR ds.CustomerId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ShipperIds}' = '' OR ds.ShipperId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ShipperIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ConsigneeIds}' = '' OR ds.ConsigneeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ConsigneeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{SaleIds}' = '' OR ds.SaleId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{SaleIds}', ',')))
    AND (('{FileIds}' = '' or ds.ParentId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FileIds}', ','))))
    AND ('{DepartmentId}' = '' or ds.DepartmentId = '{DepartmentId}')
    AND (('{HblIds}' = '' or ds.Id in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ','))))
    AND ('{TypeIds}' = '' OR ds.TypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{TypeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{ShipmentTypeId}' = '' OR ds.ShipmentTypeId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ShipmentTypeId}', ',')))
    )"
}
Components.PreQuery:
{
    "FromDate": this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "ToDate": this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "DateFieldId": this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId ? this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId : 'ShipmentDate',
    "Complete": this.EditForm.Entity.Complete || "0,1",
    "DepartmentId": this.EditForm.Entity.DepartmentId || "",
    "Currency": this.EditForm.Entity.Currency || "Local",
    "Group": this.EditForm.Entity.GroupId || "ParentId",
    "OrderBy": this.EditForm.Entity.Group ? this.EditForm.Entity.Group.OrderBy : "ds.TypeId asc,ds.ParentId asc",
    "SaleIds": this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds : "",
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds : "",
    "FileIds": this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds : "",
    "HblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds : "",
    "ServiceIds": this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds : "",
    "TypeIds": this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds : "",
    "ShipmentTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.ShipmentTypeId ? this.EditForm.Entity.ShipmentTypeId : ""
}
